entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
